image.title: DealNews - Today's Edition
image.description: dealnews.com - where everyday is Black Friday. We bring you the best deals, coupons, and promotional offers from over 2,000 online retailers every day.

item.title: Refurb Dell Intel Dual Core 1.8GHz All-in-One 17" PC for $200 + free shipping
item.description:
As one of its daily deals, 1Sale offers the refurbished Dell GX755 Pentium Dual 1.8GHz All-in-One 17" Desktop PC for $199.99 with free shipping. That's $200 off list and tied with last week's mention as the lowest total price we've seen for any all-in-one desktop. It features a 17" 1280x768 LCD, Intel Pentium Dual-Core E2160 1.8GHz processor, 2GB RAM, 80GB 7200 rpm hard drive, DVD-ROM, Gigabit Ethernet, and Windows 7 Professional. Deal ends today.

A 1-year warranty applies, although it's unclear who supports it. Expect this item to take one to two weeks to arrive.

item.title: Unlisted by Kenneth Cole Men's Oval N Under Loafers for $30 + free shipping
item.description: 6pm offers the Unlisted by Kenneth Cole Men's Oval N Under Loafers in Brown for $29.75 with free shipping. That's $55 off list and the lowest total price we could find. These shoes are available in sizes 7.5 to 11.5.

item.title: DG Eyewear Unisex Aviator Sunglasses for $3 + free shipping
item.description: Big Fly Sports via Amazon offers the DG Eyewear Unisex Aviator Sunglasses in Silver for $2.98 with free shipping. That's the lowest total price we could find by $9, although we saw them for pennies less two weeks ago. They feature UV400 filtering.

item.title: PUMA Men's Universal IT Shoes for $25 + free shipping
item.description: 6pm offers the PUMA Men's Universal IT Shoes in Black/White/Ribbon Red for $24.99 with free shipping. That's $19 under our mention of a different color from last summer and the lowest total price we could find by $15. They're available in sizes 11 to 14.

item.title: Rockport Vault Sale: 50% to 70% off shoes + free shipping
item.description: Rockport takes 50 to 70% off select men's and women's shoes during its Vault Sale. (Prices are as marked.) Plus, coupon code "SPRINGFUN" bags free shipping. Combined, it's the best sale we've seen from Rockport this year. Deal ends April 27.

item.title: iRobot Roomba 650 Robotic Vacuum Cleaner Bundle for $299 + free shipping
item.description:
Amazon offers the iRobot Roomba 650 Robotic Vacuum Cleaner, model no. R650020, for an in-cart price of $299 with free shipping. That's a buck below last month's mention and the lowest total price we could find by $101. It features a 3-stage cleaning system, virtual wall, object avoidance, 10-1/2" cleaning path, and on-board scheduling.

Update: Add this iRobot Roomba 600 Series Replenishment Kit to your cart for free; the discount shows at final checkout.

item.title: Harman Kardon HKTS 16 5.1-Channel Speaker System for $199 + free shipping
item.description:
Harman/Kardon offers its Harman Kardon HKTS 16 5.1-Channel Home Theater Speaker System in Black, model no. HKTS 16BQ, for $379.99. Coupon code "HKTS16PROMO" cuts it to $199. With free shipping, that's $141 under our mention of a different color from a year ago and the lowest total price we could find by $151. It features four 2-way, voice-matched 120-watt satellite speakers with 3/4" dome tweeters, one center-channel speaker a 200-watt 8" powered subwoofer, and speaker cables.

Note: For new customers only, coupon code "NEWCUSTOMER55" makes it $189. (The codes stack.) Also, this item is currently on backorder with an estimated ship date of July 7.

item.title: QNAP Diskless 4-Bay NAS Sever for $290 + free shipping
item.description: TigerDirect offers the QNAP Diskless 4-Bay Network Attached Storage Server, model no. TS-420, for $289.99 with free shipping. That's $40 below our November mention and the lowest total price we could find today by $39. It features 16TB storage capacity, 512MB of RAM, and four hot-swap bays.

item.title: Kingston 120GB SATA 6Gbps 2.5" Internal SSD for $60 + free shipping
item.description: Newegg offers the Kingston 120GB SSDNow V300 Series Serial ATA 6Gb/s Internal SSD, model no. SV300S37A/120G, for $59.99 with free shipping. (Amazon offers it for the same price.) That's $6 under last week's mention and tied as the lowest price we've seen without rebate hassles. (It's a current low by $16.) It features read and write speeds of up to 450MB/s.

item.title: Refurb KitchenAid Pro 5 Plus 5-Quart Stand Mixer for $184 + free shipping
item.description: KitchenAid via eBay offers the refurbished KitchenAid Professional 5 Plus Series 5-Quart Stand Mixer in Red, Silver, or Black, model no. KV25G0X, for $229.99. That falls to $183.99 in-cart. With free shipping, that's $16 below our March mention of a refurb and $41 under the lowest total price we could find for a refurb today. It features a 450-watt motor, 10-speed control, bowl-lift design, spiral dough hook, and flat beater. A 6-month KitchenAid warranty applies.

item.title: Coleman Max Lightweight Hydration Backpack for $20 + free shipping
item.description: AltaTac via eBay offers the Coleman Max Lightweight Hydration 14-Liter Backpack in Orange, model no. 14L-2000008728, or Black, model no. 14L-2000008729, for $19.99 with free shipping. That's $3 under our mention from four days ago and the lowest total price we've seen for this backpack. (It's a current low by $35.) It features a 2-liter hydration bladder with Microban-treated anti-microbial bite valve, airflow shoulder straps, and adjustable sternum and waist straps.

item.title: Refurb ASUS VivoTab 10" 32GB Win 8 RT Tablet for $150 + free shipping
item.description: Voodublu via eBay offers the factory-refurbished, 1.2-lb. ASUS VivoTab 10.1" 32GB Windows 8 RT Tablet in Grey, model no. TF600T-B1-GR, for $149.99 with free shipping. That's $30 under our mention from three weeks ago and the lowest total price we've seen. (It's a current price low for a refurb by $110.) The tablet features an NVIDIA Tegra 3 1.3GHz quad-core processor, 10.1" 1366x768 IPS multi-touch LCD, 2GB RAM, 32GB internal flash storage, 8-megapixel back-facing camera, 2-megapixel front-facing camera, Bluetooth, 802.11n wireless, microSD slot, GPS, gyroscope, light sensor, and Windows 8 RT OS. A 90-day ASUS warranty applies.

item.title: "Where is Baby's Belly Button?" Board Book for free + free shipping
item.description: Simon and Schuster offers Karen Katz's Where is Baby's Belly Button Board Book for $5.99. Coupon code "bellybutton" cuts that to free and bags free shipping. That's $5 under the lowest total price we could find for this lift-the-flap board book.

item.title: Toys "R" Us Summer Sale: Up to $350 off outdoor toys + free shipping w/ $49
item.description: Toys "R" Us cuts up to $350 off a selection of items as part of its Get Ready For Summer Sale. Shipping starts at $7.99, or bag free shipping on orders of $49 or more. Choose from bikes, ride-ons, swing sets, pools, playhouses, trampolines, bouncers, and sporting goods.

item.title: Zojirushi Micom Electric 3-Liter Water Boiler for $87 + free shipping
item.description: Amazon offers the Zojirushi Micom Electric 3-Liter Water Boiler and Warmer, model no. CD-WBC30, for $86.67 with free shipping. That's the lowest total price we could find by $16. It features an LCD display, four keep-warm settings, cafe drip dispensing mode, automatic shut-off, and a six to ten hour timer.

item.title: NuTone Ceiling Exhaust Bath Fan for $58 + free shipping
item.description: As one of its daily deals, Home Depot offers the NuTone Ceiling Exhaust Bath Fan, model no. QTN80E, for $58.20 with free shipping. That's $7 under our fall mention and the lowest total price we could find. It features 80 cubic feet per minute of airflow, galvanized steel housing, and surface-mount installation. It's suitable for use in rooms up to 70 square foot. Deal ends today.

item.title: Denon 665W 7.1 3D Network Receiver w/ $40 Credit for $399 + free shipping
item.description: Electronics Expo via Rakuten offers the Denon 665-watt 7.1-Channel 3D Network Receiver with AirPlay, model no. AVR-X2000, for $399. Plus, coupon code "SPRING10" bags 3,990 Rakuten Super Points. (They convert to a $39.90 credit.) With free shipping and assuming you'll use the credit, that's $193 under our mention from last summer the lowest total price we could find today by $119. It features 95 watts per channel into seven channels, 3D pass-through, Ethernet, seven HDMI inputs, and one HDMI output.

item.title: Yakima SpareJoe 2-Bike Mount Rack for $65 + $5 s&h
item.description: As one of its daily deals, Woot offers the Yakima SpareJoe 2-Bike SpareTire Mount Rack, model no. 8002618, for $64.99 plus $5 for shipping. That's the lowest total price we could find by $13. It installs over a vehicle's spare tire and folds down when not in use. Deal ends April 29.

item.title: Cuisinart Chef's Classic 7-Piece Bakeware Set for $34 + free shipping
item.description: Best Buy offers the Cuisinart Chef's Classic 7-Piece Bakeware Set, model no. AMB-7VPK, for $39.99. Coupon code "EXTRA15" cuts it to $33.99. With free shipping, that's $6 below our December mention and the lowest total price we could find by $42. It includes two 9" round cake pans, a 9" square cake pan, two 9" loaf pans, 6-cup muffin pan, and 17" baking sheet.

item.title: Refurb Kindle Fire 7" 8GB Android Tablet (1st gen.) for $63 + free shipping
item.description:
A4C offers the refurbished 1st-generation Amazon Kindle Fire 7" 8GB Android Tablet, model no. B0051VVO5S, for $62.95 with free shipping. That's tied with last week's mention as the least expensive refurbished Kindle we've seen. (It's $66 less than the lowest total price we could find for a new unit.) It runs a heavily-modified version of Google's Android OS and features a dual-core processor, 7" 1024x600 IPS touchscreen display, 8GB of internal storage, 802.11n wireless, and USB.

Note: A 90-day A4C warranty applies.

item.title: ZVOX SoundBase 555 Pedestal Sound System for $300 + free shipping
item.description: Zvox offers its ZVOX SoundBase 555 Low-Profile Home Theater Sound System for $349.99. Coupon code "ZVOX555" cuts it to $299.99. With free shipping, that's the lowest total price we could find by $49. It features a 45Hz to 20kHz frequency range, 70-watt digital amplifier, 5.25" subwoofer, and five 2" main speaker drivers.

item.title: Jos. A. Bank Men's Clearance Sweaters / Vests for $15 + $6 s&h
item.description: Jos. A. Bank offers a selection of its Jos. A. Bank Men's Clearance Sweaters and Vests for $14.97 plus $5.95 for shipping. (Jos. A. Bank Men's David Leadbetter Argyle Vest pictured.) That puts each style at least $75 off list and at the lowest total price we could find.

item.title: Telltale PC / Mac game downloads: 75% off + extra 25% off, deals from 56 cents
item.description:
GameFly cuts 75% off a selection of Telltale game downloads for Windows or Mac. (The discount is reflected on the product's page.) Even better, coupon code "APR25OFF" knocks an extra 25% off, with prices starting at 56 cents after discount. Note that some of these titles require a Steam client to play. A couple of best bets, with prices after coupon:
  • Sam & Max Season One for PC for $5.62 (low by $1)
  • Tales of Monkey Island for PC or Mac for $6.56 (pictured, low by $9)

item.title: Michael Kelly Legacy Festival Mandolin for $350 + free shipping
item.description: As one of its daily deals, Musician's Friend offers the Michael Kelly Legacy Festival Mandolin in Tobacco Burst, model no. MKLFSTB, for $349.99 with free shipping. (Click on the "Stupid Deal of the Day" banner on the left to find it.) That's the lowest total price we could find by $150. This F-style mandolin features a maple body, hand-carved spruce top, and radiused rosewood fingerboard. Deal ends today.

item.title: SkinStore coupon: 20% off sitewide + free shipping w/ $49
item.description:
SkinStore takes 20% off all purchases via coupon code "FAM" during its Friends & Family Sale. (Select brands receive 25% off.) Shipping adds $4.95 but orders of $49 or more receive free shipping. Some best bets with prices after coupon:
  • June Jacobs Shave Cream for Men for $25.60 + $5 s&h (pictured, low by $1)
  • Philosophy Radiant and Refined Kit for $55.20 + $0 s&h (low by $2)

item.title: McAfee Total Protection 2014 for PC downloads w/ $10 GC for $0 after rebate
item.description: Newegg offers downloads of McAfee Total Protection 2014 3-User for Windows, model no. MTP14EBF3RAA, bundled with a $10 Newegg eGift Card for $65. (The gift card will be emailed four days after the invoice.) A $65 mail-in rebate cuts the price to $0. That's tied with our mention of a physical copy from three weeks ago (which included a flash drive instead of a gift card) and is the lowest total price we could find for the software alone by $18. This software includes protection against spyware, viruses, and phishing. Rebate expires May 1.

item.title: P3 Kill-a-Watt EZ Electricity Usage Monitor for $20 + $2 s&h
item.description: Newegg offers the P3 International Kill-a-Watt EZ Electricity Usage Monitor, model no. P4460, for $26.99. Coupon code "EMCPFHF99" cuts it to $20.24. With $1.99 for shipping, that's the lowest total price we could find by $4, although we saw it for $2 less in February. It calculates electricity costs and gives you weekly, monthly, or yearly forecasts. Deal ends April 30.

item.title: Free Pretzel at PretzelMaker or Philly Pretzel Factory
item.description:
Today only, at participating PretzelMaker locations, receive a free pretzel in honor of National Pretzel Day. That's the first free pretzel offer we've seen from PretzelMaker since last National Pretzel Day. Click here to find a location near you.

Philly Pretzel Factory also offers a free pretzel today at participating locations.

item.title: Ozark Trail Instant 10x10-Foot Screen House for $59 + free shipping
item.description: Walmart offers the Ozark Trail Instant 10x10-Foot Screen House, model no. CV1010SC, for $59 with free shipping. That's the lowest total price we could find $17. It features heavy-duty mesh, two doors, 50+ UV protection, and a carry bag.

item.title: Disney's "Frozen" Hardcover Book for $2 + pickup at Walmart
item.description: Walmart offers Disney's Frozen Little Golden Book in Hardcover for $2.38. Choose Site-to-Store pickup to avoid the $4.97 shipping cost. (Amazon charges a penny more with free shipping for Prime members.) That's a buck under the lowest price we could find for this book with pickup elsewhere.

item.title: Misfit Shine Activity Monitor for $60 + free shipping
item.description: As one of its daily deals, Best Buy offers the Misfit Shine Activity Monitor in Topaz, model no. SH0GZ, Black, model no. SH0AZ, Gold, model no. SH0HZ, or Silver, model no. SH0AZ, for $59.99 with free shipping. That's tied with our mention from last month and the lowest total price we could find for any color by $40. It tracks steps, distance, and calories burned, records how well you sleep, stores an approximate 30-day history, functions as a watch, and is water-resistant up to 164 feet. Deal ends today

item.title: New Balance Men's Socks 4-Packs w/ $10 SYWR Credit for $10 + free shipping
item.description: Sears offers Shop Your Way Rewards members several New Balance Men's Regular Socks 4-Packs for $10.40. (2-Packs and 3-Packs are also available for the same price. New Balance Men's Lightning Dry Moisture Wicking Crew Socks pictured.) Plus, Shop Your Way Rewards members can sign in to earn $10.52 in SYWR points via coupon code "SYWPTS10". (Not a member? It's free to join.) With free shipping for members, and assuming you'll use the credit, that's effectively $0 per pair and $14 below the lowest total price we could find for a 4-pack of such New Balance socks elsewhere.

item.title: SmithMicro Anime Studio Debut 9 for PC for $10 + free shipping
item.description: As one of its daily deals, Newegg offers the SmithMicro Anime Studio Debut 9 for Windows for $9.99 with free shipping. That's the lowest total price we could find for this previous-edition software by $6. Deal ends today.

item.title: Game Of Thrones Decals for $4 + free shipping, Wall Clings for $10
item.description:
As one of its daily deals, THAT Daily Deal offers the Game Of Thrones Noble Houses Coat Of Arm Decal in four styles for $3.99 with free shipping. That's $6 off list price and the lowest total price we could find. It measures 5" x 6" and is available for the houses of Stark, Lannister, Targaryen, and Baratheon.

THAT Daily Deal also offers the Game Of Thrones Wall Cling in four styles for $9.98 with free shipping. That's the best price we could find for such an item. It measures 13.8" x 16.5" and is available in the same house styles as above. Both deals end today.

item.title: Dell 20" Touchscreen LED LCD Display for $130 + free shipping
item.description: As one of its daily deals, Best Buy offers the Dell 19.5" Touchscreen LED-Backlit LCD Monitor, model no. E2014T, for $129.99 with free shipping. That's $23 below our mention from two weeks ago and the lowest total price we've seen. (It's a current low by $68.) Features include a 1600x900 resolution, LED backlight, 5-point multitouch display, MHL input, USB, and DisplayPort, HDMI, and VGA inputs. Deal ends today.

item.title: Offset 10-Foot Hanging Patio Umbrella for $60 + free shipping
item.description: Best Choice Products via eBay offers this Offset 10-Foot Hanging Patio Umbrella in Red (pictured) or Brown for $59.99 with free shipping. That's the lowest total price we could find for similar umbrella by $30. It features adjustable angle, aluminum pole, steel bottom frame, powder-coated steel ribs, and crank operation.

item.title: Open-Box OtterBox Commuter Case for iPhone 5/5S for $10 + free shipping, more
item.description:
Paydeals offers the open-box OtterBox Commuter Case for iPhone 5 / 5S in Black (pictured), model no. 77-21912, for $9.99 with free shipping. That's a buck under our December mention of a factory-sealed unit and the lowest total price we could find for any color by $5. This case features two layers of protection. Note that it ships in bulk packaging and doesn't include the screen protector.

Also available is the open-box OtterBox Commuter Case for the Samsung Galaxy S4 Android Smartphone in Black, model no. 77-27604, for $9.99 with free shipping. That's $6 under our fall mention of a factory-sealed unit and the lowest total price we could find for a case in bulk packaging now by $7. Note that it ships in bulk packaging.

item.title: Tropic Thunder: Director's Cut on Blu-ray for $5 + pickup at Best Buy
item.description: Best Buy offers Tropic Thunder: Director's Cut on Blu-ray Disc for $4.99. Opt for in-store pickup to dodge a $1.99 shipping fee. That's $3 under the best shipped price we could find elsewhere.

item.title: The North Face Women's Isotherm Half-Zip Top for $57 + free shipping
item.description: As one of its daily deals, REI-Outlet offers The North Face Women's Isotherm Half-Zip Top in Pixie Purple/Black or Meridian Blue/Asphalt Grey for $56.73 with free shipping. That's $58 off list and the lowest price we could find. It's available in sizes XS to XL. Deal ends today.

item.title: "Advanced Reading, Writing, and Grammar for Test Prep" Kindle eBook for free
item.description: Amazon offers Like Test Prep's Advanced Reading, Writing, and Grammar for Test Prep eBook for Kindle for free. That's a $12 drop from list and the best deal we could find. A Kindle or Kindle-enabled device is required to download and read this eBook.

item.title: Villa Florence in San Francisco: Rooms from $133 per night
item.description:
BookIt offers stays at the Villa Florence in San Francisco, CA, with prices starting at $133 per night via coupon code "BKTS10", as provided by ShermansTravel. (Click on "Check Rates" and "Try Our Lowest Price Calendar" to find these rates. Enter the coupon at final checkout.) That's the lowest current nightly rate we could find for stays at this property by $11. Blackout dates and additional fees may apply. Book this travel deal by April 30 for stays through December 31.

Of note, BookIt offers stays in other hotels in or around San Francisco with prices starting at $108 per night. Scroll down to see them all.

item.title: Book Club Favorites Kindle eBooks for $2
item.description: As one of its daily deals, Amazon offers 43 Kindle eBooks for $1.99 each during its Book Club Favorites Sale. Most books are price lows by $9 or more. Choose from titles such as Barbara Kingsolver's "Flight Behavior," Mitch Albom's "The First Phone Call From Heaven," and Adriana Trigiani's "The Shoemaker's Wife" (pictured). Deal ends today.

item.title: Tearaway for PS Vita for $15 + pickup at Best Buy
item.description: As one of its daily deals, Best Buy offers Tearaway for PlayStation Vita for $14.99. Opt for in-store pickup to dodge a $1.99 shipping fee. That's $9 below our December mention and the lowest price we've seen. (It's a current low of $20.) Deal ends today.

item.title: Unlocked Blu Aria T174 GSM Dual-SIM Phone for $15 + free shipping
item.description: Staples offers the Unlocked Blu Aria T174 GSM Dual-SIM Phone in Black/Blue for $14.99. Plus, Staples Rewards members qualify for free shipping. (Not a member? Click here to sign up for free.) That's the lowest total price we could find by $3 and also the second-best price we've seen for a dual-sim unlocked phone without rebate hassles. This quad-band GSM phone features a 1.8" display, Bluetooth 3.0, camera, and built-in FM antenna. Deal ends April 28.

item.title: Jos. A. Bank Clearance: Extra 33% off + free shipping w/ $50
item.description:
Jos. A. Bank takes an extra 33% off clearance items. (Prices are as marked.) Even better, take $10 off orders of $100 or more via coupon code "RMNTEN". Shipping starts at $5.95, or spend over $50 to bag free shipping. Deal ends April 27. A couple of best bets:
  • Jos. A Bank Men's Traveler Pinpoint Buttondown Collar Dress Shirt for $55 (pictured, $33 off)
  • Jos. A. Bank Men's Tropical Blend 2-Button Ticweave Suit for $189 via "RMNTEN" ($506 off)

item.title: 3-Night Bahamas Flight and Hotel Package for 2 from $574
item.description: CheapCaribbean offers a Flamingo Bay Hotel and Marina 3-Night Flight and Hotel Package for Two in Grand Bahama Island, Bahamas, with prices starting at $574.26, as provided by ShermansTravel. That's the least-expensive 3-night Bahamas vacation we've seen in the past 12 months. Its also a current low for this package by $314. This price is based on departure from Fort Lauderdale, FL, (FLL) with arrival in Freeport, Bahamas, (FPO) on July 27; other departure cities are available for an additional cost. Some dates may be excluded and additional fees may apply. Book this travel deal by April 30 for travel through August 31.

item.title: Craftsman Ergonomic Hand Gardening Weeder for $5 + pickup at Sears
item.description: As one of its daily deals, Sears offers the Craftsman Ergonomic Hand Gardening Weeder, model no. 405295231, for $4.99. Choose in-store pickup to dodge the $6.50 shipping fee. That's $5 off list and tied with our January mention as the lowest price we could find. It features an ergonomic resin handle, finger stop, and thumb rest. Deal ends today.

item.title: Body Central Jewelry: Buy 1, get 50% off 2nd + free shipping
item.description:
At Body Central, buy one regular-price jewelry item, get a second regular-price jewelry item for 50% off. (Discount will apply in-cart.) Apply coupon code "APRILSHIP" to bag free shipping. A couple best bets:
  • 2 Body Central Women's Three Row Gemstone Bib Necklaces for $23.97 (pictured, $8 off)
  • 2 Body Central Women's Ribbon Woven Box Chains for $23.97 (pictured, $8 off)

item.title: Apple to replace sleep/wake buttons for select iPhone 5 devices
item.description: Apple will be offering free sleep/wake button replacements for select iPhone 5 models. It has been discovered that these devices may feature sleep/wake buttons that either don't work or only function intermittently. Affected models were manufactured through March 2013. Click here for more information, and to see if your iPhone 5 is eligible.

item.title: Spec-D Altezza Tail Lights for 1995-2004 Chevy Blazer for $45 + free shipping
item.description:
K2 Motor offers the Spec-D Smoked Altezza Tail Lights for 1995-2004 Chevy Blazer, model no. LT-BLZ95G-TM_1, for $48.95. Coupon code "k2-fb10" cuts it to $45.03. With free shipping, that's the lowest total price we could find by $40. They are made and approved by a certified manufacturer, and all wiring is pre-assembled.

Note that this item is temporarily out of stock, but can still be ordered at this price for delivery when available. (It's currently estimated to be available on April 29.)

item.title: Spec-D 2" Oil Temp Gauge for $32 + free shipping
item.description: K2 Motor offers the Spec-D 2" Oil Temp Gauge, model no. RG-2SD06, for $34.95. Coupon code "k2-fb10" cuts it to $32.15. With free shipping, that's the lowest total price we could find by $34. This universal-fit gauge features an aluminum/titanium coating.

item.title: Tool Storage at Sears: Up to 30% off, deals from $15 + free shipping via SYWM
item.description:
Sears takes up to 30% off tool storage, with prices starting at $14.99. Plus, many items qualify for free shipping via SYWM. (Not a member? It's free to sign up for a 90-day trial; in-store pickup is also available on many items.) Some best bets:
  • Craftsman Tool Chest Drawer Organizer for $14.99 (pictured, $5 off)
  • Craftsman 36" Wide 5-Drawer Industrial Grade Top Chest for $524.99 ($525 off)

item.title: Citi Simplicity(R) Card: 0% introductory APR for 18 months
item.description:
Sign up for the Citi Simplicity® Credit Card and receive a 0% introductory APR on purchases and balance transfers for the first 18 months of cardmembership. (After that, the variable APR will be 12.99% to 21.99%. There is a balance transfer fee of either $5 or 3% of the amount of each transfer, whichever is greater.) Plus, there's no late fees, no penalty rate, and no annual fee - ever. You can also save time when you call with fast, personal help, 24 hours a day. For more terms and conditions, click here.

This card — and several more — can be found on our Citibank Credit Card page.

item.title: Red South Beach Hotel in Miami: Rooms from $89 per night
item.description:
BookIt offers stays at the Red South Beach Hotel in Miami, FL, with prices starting at $89.01 per night via coupon code "BKTS10", as provided by ShermansTravel. (Click on "Check Rates" and "Try Our Lowest Price Calendar" to find these rates. Enter coupon at final checkout.) That's $10 under last month's mention and the lowest rate we've seen for stays at this property. It's also a current low by $9. Some dates may be excluded and additional fees may apply. Book this travel deal by April 30 for stays through December 31.

Of note, BookIt offers stays in other hotels in or around Miami with prices starting at $66 per night. Scroll down to see them all.

item.title: Victoria's Secret Dresses & Shoes: 20% off + free shipping w/ $50, more
item.description:
Victoria's Secret takes 20% off one item from its dresses and shoes categories via coupon code "STYLE25VS". Plus, bag a Victoria's Secret Angel Wing Necklace for free with orders of $75 or more via coupon code "NECKLACE". Better yet, apply coupon code "SHIP50VS" to score free shipping on orders of $50 or more; otherwise, shipping starts at $5.99. (Alternatively, take $20 off orders of $125 or more via coupon code "20OFF125". Note that you may only stack three codes.) Deal ends April 27. Some best bets with prices after the 20% off coupon and free shipping:
  • Victoria's Secret Women's VS Collection Mid-Heel T-Strap Sandals for $66 (pictured, $22 off)
  • Victoria's Secret Women's Cap-Sleeve Babydoll Dress for $73.50 ($24 off)

item.title: Leap Motion Controller for PC / Mac w/ $20 App Credit for $80 + free shipping
item.description: StackSocial offers the Leap Motion Controller for Windows and Mac, model no. LM-010, bundled with a $20 Leap Motion App Store Credit for $79.99 with free shipping. Assuming you use the credit, that's the lowest total price we could find for the controller by $20, although we saw it for $8 less in December. (Most retailers are charging $80 for the controller alone now.) The Leap Motion Controller uses the space between you and your computer to track the movement of your hands at a rate of 200 frames per second. It purports to follow all 10 fingers up to 1/100th of a millimeter, making it significantly more sensitive than existing motion-control technology. Deal ends May 8.

item.title: Sega GO DANCE for iPhone, iPod touch, and iPad for free
item.description: The iTunes App Store offers downloads of Sega GO DANCE for iPhone, iPod touch, and iPad for free. That's a $2 drop and the best deal we've seen for this motion-activated dance game.

item.title: Magnetizer / Demagnetizer Tool 2-Pack for $5 + free shipping

item.title: US Airways Premier World MasterCard(R): Earn up to 40,000 Bonus Miles
item.description:
Sign up for the US Airways Premier World MasterCard® and earn 30,000 Bonus Miles after your first purchase or balance transfer. Plus, earn up to 10,000 Bonus Miles when you transfer a balance within 90 days of account opening. (1 mile per $1 transferred.) You also earn 2 miles per $1 on US Airways purchases and earn 1 mile per $1 on purchases everywhere else. Exclusive privileges are also available including annual companion certificates good for up to 2 companion tickets at $99 each (plus taxes and fees), Zone 2 priority boarding, and first-class check-in on all US Airways flights. Finally, you can enjoy a 0% Intro APR on purchases and balance transfers for the first 12 months after account opening. (After that a variable APR currently 15.99% or 24.99% depending on your creditworthiness. An $89 annual fee applies. For more terms and conditions, click here.

This card — and several more — can be found on our Barclaycard Credit Card page.

item.title: The Cost of Textbooks Is Rising Faster Than the Price of College Tuition
item.description: With textbook prices increasing faster than tuition, classroom materials can cost students hundreds of additional dollars every semester. And with professors mandating which books to buy, students are a captive market. But here are some ways to save on that necessary reading material.

item.title: Clearance Shoes at DSW: Up to 80% off, deals from $15 + free shipping w/ $35
item.description: DSW takes up to 80% off a selection of men's and women's shoes in its clearance section, with deals on women's shoes starting from $14.94 and men's shoes from $29.94. (Prices are as marked.) Shipping adds $7.95, or DSW Rewards members receive free shipping on orders of $35 or more via coupon code "SHIPR". (Not a member? It's free to join; otherwise, shipping adds $7.95.) Note that sizes and stock may be limited. The sale includes brands like Calvin Klein, Steve Madden, BCBG, Converse, and Crocs.

item.title: Kohl's Lowest Prices of the Season Sale: Up to 70% off + extra 20% off, more
item.description:
Kohl's cuts up to 70% off a selection of apparel, shoes, home items, and more as part of its Lowest Prices of the Season Sale. Even better, take an extra 20% off via coupon code "SAVE20LPS". Plus, you'll get $10 in Kohl's Cash for every $50 you spend. (The Kohl's Cash can be redeemed from May 1 to 11.) Shipping starts at $5.95, or get free shipping on orders of $75 or more. (Larger items may carry additional shipping charges.) Offer ends April 30. Some best bets, with prices after discount:
  • SONOMA outdoors 9-foot Market Patio Umbrella w/ $10 Kohl's Cash for $43.99 w/ $9 s&h ($86 off)
  • Bissell DeepClean Pet Cleaner w/ $30 Kohl's Cash for $159.19 + $0 s&h (low by $38)

item.title: The 5 Best Storage Solutions to Avert Data Disasters
item.description: Whether you're in need of more storage or averting disaster and replacing a failing hard drive, there's never a bad time to swap out your HDD. This week's best storage deals should make the task easier as they include a 6TB drive for $300, a 240GB SSD for $110, and for the constant traveler, two Lexar 32GB USB flash drives for just $22.

item.title: Hair, Skin, Nails 200-Count Vitamins 5-Pack for $3 + free shipping
item.description: Puritan's Pride offers the Hair, Skin, Nails 200-Count Vitamins 5-Pack for $2.95. It drops to $2.66 in-cart. With free shipping, that's $0.53 per pack, $7 off list and the lowest total price we could find. They contain antioxidants C and E, and 3,000mcg Biotin. Deal ends April 27.

item.title: Amazon Will Exclusively Stream HBO Shows Starting Next Month
item.description: Amazon announced yesterday that it has entered a multi-year contract with HBO to be the sole streaming provider of its content. That means that only Prime subscribers will be able to stream HBO shows without subscribing to the channel itself.

item.title: 9 Surprising Perks You Didn't Realize Your Credit Card Offers
item.description: Better known credit card rewards include cashback and points you can use to "shop" through catalogs. But some companies go a bit farther and offer perks that many shoppers don't know about. Check to see if your credit cards carry any of these money-saving bonuses.

item.title: LendingTree Home Loans: Compare multiple offers in minutes
item.description: LendingTree allows you to compare multiple home loan offers in minutes. Plus, submitting a loan request is easy and free. Choose from home purchase, refinance, reverse mortgage, or home equity loans on several types of properties.

item.title: It's Our Birthday, Win Some Stuff!
item.description:
Some say that April is the cruelest month, but usually only the people who haven't won our 17th Anniversary sweepstakes! Thanks to our sponsors, one of you will receive a Lenovo IdeaPad Yoga 2 Pro Touchscreen Laptop from Lenovo, an HP Chromebook 11 Laptop from HP, and a Bulova Precisionist Watch from Ashford.com. And to prove how cool (and not cruel) we are, we'll also throw in a 60" HDTV, too. (We don't know the brand yet because we're — no joke — waiting on a deal!)

Has this collection of winnables made you cruelly and uncoolly drool? Then enter the DealNews 17th Anniversary Sweepstakes daily until April 30 at 11:59 pm ET.
